## Initializing and testing
```{r Initializing}
## for hezi-rack: 
# .libPaths('~/R/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-library/')
library(InformationAndInference)
```



## OLS

```{r Testing}
configurations <- makeConfiguration(reps = 2, m = 1e1, p = c(1e1,2e1), n = c(1e2) , kappa = 5e-1, lambda = 2, model = my.ols, link = identity, sigma = 1e0, beta.maker = makeBetasRandom, beta.star.maker = identity ) 
configurations %>% dim
apply(configurations, 1, replicateMSE)
```


```{r}
configurations <- makeConfiguration(
  reps = 1e2,
  m = c(1e1, 1e2), 
  p = c(1e1, 5e1), 
  n = seq(2e2, 1e3,length.out=5), 
  kappa = 5e-1, model = my.ols, link = identity, sigma = 1e1 ) 

cl <- makeCluster(30)
clusterEvalQ(cl, {
  .libPaths('~/R/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-library/')
  library(InformationAndInference)
  })
MSEs.0 <- parApply(cl, configurations, 1, replicateMSE)
save(MSEs.0, configurations, file='RData/MSEs.0.RData')
stopCluster(cl)
```


```{r plot_1, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
MSEs.framed <- frameMSEs(MSEs.0, configurations)
plotMSEs(MSEs.framed, 'test')
```




## Ridge

```{r MakeConfiguration}
# Create configurations:
configurations <- makeConfiguration(reps = 1e1, m = 1e1, p = 5e1, n = c(2e2, 5e2) ,  kappa = 5e-1, lambda = 2, model = my.ols, link = identity, sigma = 1e1,beta.maker =makeBetasDeterministic, beta.star.maker  = ridgeBeta ) 

# Testing:
configurations %>% dim
apply(configurations, 1, replicateMSE)
```


```{r}
configurations <- makeConfiguration(
  reps = 1e2,
  m = c(1e1, 1e2), 
  p = c(5e1, 1e2), 
  n = seq(2e2, 1e3,length.out=5), 
  kappa = 5e-1, model = my.ols, link = identity, sigma = 1e1 ) 

cl <- makeCluster(30)
clusterEvalQ(cl, {
  .libPaths('~/R/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-library/')
  library(InformationAndInference)
  })
MSEs.0 <- parApply(cl, configurations, 1, replicateMSE)
save(MSEs.0, configurations, file='RData/MSEs.0.RData')
stopCluster(cl)
```




## Huber Loss
```{r Huber, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
for(i in 1:4) {
  compareParallelizeRegression_ms(p, kappa =2^-i, ms, my.huber, coefs.huber)
  }
```


Now computing the ratio of $l_2$ norm of errors between estimtors:
```{r}
.getMSE <- function(kappa) getMSERegression_ms(
  replications, kappa, p, ms, my.huber, coefs.huber)
# MSEs.2 <- kappas %>% lapply(.getMSE)

cl <- makeCluster(detectCores()-1)
clusterEvalQ(cl, {
  source('libraries.R')
  source('utility.R')
  source('utility_fixed_p_vary_m.R')
  })
exporting <- c('p', 'ms','kappas','replications', '.getMSE', 
               'my.huber', 'coefs.huber')
clusterExport(cl, exporting)
MSEs_ms.1 <- parLapplyLB(cl, kappas, .getMSE)
stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r plot_2, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.1, p, kappas, "Huber")
```



## Absolute loss regression:
```{r Absolute_loss, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
for(i in 1:4) {
  compareParallelizeRegression_ms(p, kappa =2^-i, ms, 
                                  my.absolute, coefs.absolute)
  }
```


Now computing the ratio of MSEs between estimtors:
```{r, cache=TRUE}
.getMSE <- function(kappa) getMSERegression_ms(
  replications, kappa, p, ms, my.absolute, coefs.absolute)
# MSEs.3 <- kappas %>% lapply(.getMSE)

cl <- makeCluster(detectCores()-1)
clusterEvalQ(cl, {
  source('libraries.R')
  source('utility.R')
  source('utility_fixed_p_vary_m.R')
  })
exporting <- c('p', 'ms','kappas','replications', '.getMSE',
               'my.absolute', 'coefs.absolute')
clusterExport(cl, exporting )
MSEs_ms.3 <- parLapplyLB(cl, kappas, .getMSE)
stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r plot_3, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.3, p, kappas, "Absolute")
```




## Logistic Regression
```{r Logistic, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
for(i in 2:5) {
  compareParallelizeClassification_ms(p, kappa =2^-i, ms, 
                                      my.logistic, coefs.logistic)
  }
```


Now computing the ratio of $l_2$ norm of errors beween estimtors:
```{r}
.getMSE <- function(kappa) getMSEClassification_ms(
  replications, kappa, p, ms, my.logistic, coefs.logistic)
# MSEs.5 <- kappas %>% lapply(.getMSE)

cl <- makeCluster(detectCores()-1)
clusterEvalQ(cl, {
  source('libraries.R')
  source('utility.R')
  source('utility_fixed_p_vary_m.R')
  })
exporting <- c('p', 'ms','kappas','replications', '.getMSE', 
               'my.logistic', 'coefs.logistic')
clusterExport(cl, exporting)
MSEs_ms.5 <- parLapplyLB(cl, kappas, .getMSE)
stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r plot_4}
plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.5, p, kappas, replications, "Logistic", y.lim = c(0,20))
```




```{r all_plots}

plot.2 <- plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.1, p, kappas, "(b) Huber")
plot.3 <- plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.3, p, kappas, "(c) Absolute")
plot.4 <- plotMSE_ms(MSEs_ms.5, p, kappas, "(d) Logistic", y.lim = c(1,20))
```
